title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 Feb 14 FR [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Friday, 14 February 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On the Friday, February 14 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Alex covers the latest developments in media control, mass brainwashing and the myth of "global warming." 

After U.S. Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas said that the nation is too obsessed on racial differences, authoritarians have attacked him by implying that he is racist. 

On today's show, Jonathan Davis, lead vocalist of Korn, discusses how mainstream media manipulates the minds of millions and the mass erosion of privacy. [Davis was not on due to Skype problems; rescheduled for Monday.]

Meanwhile, despite the fact that there is snow on the ground in 49 states, including Hawaii, CBS blamed the extreme cold on global warming. 

Marc Morano of Climate Depot also reveals techniques used by the media to build up the "global warming" lie.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
